name: books-challenge
description: This repository holds an Express application with challenges to complete

scripts.db:create: sequelize db:drop & sequelize db:migrate & sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.db:reset: sequelize db:migrate:undo:all & sequelize db:migrate & sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.db:creates: npx sequelize db:drop & npx sequelize db:create & npx sequelize db:migrate & npx sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.db:resets: npx sequelize db:migrate:undo:all & npx sequelize db:migrate & npx sequelize db:seed:all
